alert.note: Alert for Central Douglas County; Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; Jackson County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 7:46PM PST until December 29 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY ABOVE 1500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 1500 feet. Snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...In California, Western Siskiyou County. This includes Klamath River, Happy Camp, Fort Jones and Etna. In Oregon, Central Douglas County, Eastern Curry County and Josephine County and Jackson County. This includes, Ashland, Talent, Jacksonville, Ruch, and the higher passes on I-5 north of Grants Pass. It also includes portions of Highway 199 between Grants Pass and Obrien. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery and icy road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. * Carry tire chains and be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities. * See https://www.tripcheck.com or http://quickmap.dot.ca.gov for latest road conditions. * A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means that periods of snow will cause travel difficulties.

area.areaDesc: Central Douglas County; Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; Jackson County
